response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
